name: 3SD Hazy
author: Exia
notes: KoG after 6 months of hiatus from playing PvP, so naturally started at rookie 1. I wasn't sure of what to use, last time I did PvP was when REZD/Handless were tier 1, and CA's + Ninjas didn't exist. Checked Dkayed's YT channel, saw his most recent hazy deck, and climbed from rookkie 1 to KoG with it in 87 duels. 77 wins, 10 losses.
